concept-wr.title: Inventory Management Facilities
concept-wr.shortdesc: Titanium Server provides complete inventory management of hosts in the OpenStack cloud, allowing the system administrator to install, configure, and maintain the individual servers.

conbody.p: The inventory service gives the system administrator the following capabilities:

li.p: discovery of new hosts in the cluster
installation of the appropriate load, controller, compute, or storage images
configuration of the management, OAM, infrastructure, and provider network interfaces on each host
US66653 mention additional profile typescreation and use of profiles for CPU, interface, memory, and storage assignments to simplify host configuration
configuration of the number of CPUs allocated to the Accelerated Virtual Switch (AVS) on each compute node
configuration of huge memory page allocations for VM use
switch active controller host or service
real-time command execution reports, such as booting and testing
hardware sensors (for example, temperature or voltage sensors)
US75601 addedCentralized visual reporting for compute node data interfaces and provider network topologies, including alarm status indicators
additional hardware devices, such as cryptographic and compression devices
